description:
Welcome to my home! Features comfy bed w/ quiet courtyard facing windows, high-ceilings, stylish living room & clean modern bathroom. Perfect for anyone looking to stay in the heart of Chelsea near Chelsea market/High Line area. Incl. HBO, Netflix, big screen tv.

Comfy bed, air mattress available, location!
name: Bright Modern Quiet Chelsea true 1bed
review: Very comfortable apartment is a perfect location - close to Chelsea and transport. Michael was a great host and perfect communication
